roleset.name: emit, let forth

example.name: passive
example.text: Fortunately, the Hubble Space Telescope -- set to be launched on the shuttle next year in a search for distant solar systems and light-1 emitted [*]-1 14 billion years ago from the farthest reaches of the universe -- was moved from Sunnyvale to the Kennedy Space Center in Florida at the beginning of October.
example.arg: from the farthest reaches of the universe

example.name: ARG1 and ARG0
example.text: A year and a half ago Ritek invested in the production of OLED -LRB- organic light - emitting diode -RRB- displays , which is yet another technology used in portable computing devices that relies on thin opto - electrical film application techniques .

example.name: All args
example.text: The EU has taken on the obligation of reducing its emission of greenhouse gases by 20 percent by 2020.

roleset.note: EMIT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'emit' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry, Framenet entry Emitting. (from emit.01-v predicate notes)
EMISSION-N NOTES: Roleset based on instances in BOLT DF07. Framed by Claire. (from emission.01-n)
